test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with a valid title, description, notes, and expiry_date succeeds and returns the persisted todo.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with All Fields Valid

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo without a title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Missing Title

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with an empty title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Empty Title

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with only the required title succeeds, and optional fields are null or absent.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Only Title

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with an expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Invalid Expiry Date Format

test_cases.description: Verify that the list endpoint returns all persisted todos with their fields.
test_cases.name: List Todos with Multiple Items

given.precondition: Two todos exist: one with all fields, one with only title

test_cases.description: Verify that the list endpoint returns an empty array when no todos exist.
test_cases.name: List Todos When None Exist

test_cases.description: Verify that the get endpoint returns the correct todo record for a valid id.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Valid ID

test_cases.description: Verify that the get endpoint returns an error when the todo does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Nonexistent ID

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with some fields updates only those fields.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with Some Fields

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with all fields updates them accordingly.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with All Fields

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with an invalid expiry_date returns an error.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with Invalid Expiry Date

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with a nonexistent id returns an error.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with Nonexistent ID

test_cases.description: Verify that deleting a todo with a valid id succeeds and the todo is no longer accessible.
test_cases.name: Delete Todo with Valid ID

postcondition: todoApi.list() does not include todo with id='id2'

test_cases.description: Verify that deleting a todo with a nonexistent id returns an error.
test_cases.name: Delete Todo with Nonexistent ID

test_cases.description: Verify that expiry_date accepts 'YYYY-MM-DD' even for leap years.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Leap Year Expiry Date

test_cases.description: Verify that expiry_date does not accept invalid leap days for non-leap years.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Invalid Leap Day Expiry Date

response_body_json.error: expiry_date is not a valid calendar date

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with a title of 255 characters succeeds.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Boundary Title Length (255 chars)

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with a title of 256 characters fails if there is a max-length constraint.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Title Length Exceeding Boundary (256 chars)

test_cases.description: Verifies that the component fetches and displays the list of todos when mounted.
test_cases.name: Fetch todos on component mount

test_setup.given: The App component is rendered with no todos loaded.
test_setup.then: todoApi.list() is called and the returned todos are displayed with all their fields.

test_cases.description: Checks that each todo displays title, description, notes, and expiry_date correctly.
test_cases.name: Render all todo fields

test_setup.given: A list of todos with populated title, description, notes, and expiry_date.
test_setup.then: Each todo shows all fields, with optional fields empty if not set.

test_cases.description: Ensures that clicking the 'New todo' button displays the creation form.
test_cases.name: Show form on 'New todo' button click

test_setup.given: Todos are listed in the App component.
test_setup.then: TodoForm for creation is displayed with empty fields.

test_cases.description: Tests that a todo can be created with only the required title field.
test_cases.name: Create todo with required field only

test_setup.then: A new todo is created and added to the list, optional fields are null or absent.
test_setup.when: User enters a valid title and submits the form.

test_cases.description: Checks creation of a todo with title, description, notes, and a valid expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all fields

test_setup.then: A new todo with all fields populated is added to the list.
test_setup.when: User fills all fields with valid values and submits.

test_cases.description: Verifies that the form shows an error and prevents creation if title is missing.
test_cases.name: Create todo with missing title

test_setup.then: Form shows error message, creation is aborted, and no API call is made.
test_setup.when: User submits the form with an empty title.

test_cases.description: Checks that submitting an invalid expiry_date string results in a validation error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: Form shows error message, creation is aborted, and no API call is made.
test_setup.when: User enters an invalid expiry_date (e.g., '2023/12/31') and submits.

test_cases.description: Checks that clicking edit displays the form pre-filled with the todo's data.
test_cases.name: Edit todo shows form with existing values

test_setup.given: A todo is listed in the UI.
test_setup.then: TodoForm appears with the todo's current values filled in.
test_setup.when: User clicks the edit button for that todo.

test_cases.description: Ensures that updating the title field changes the todo and updates the list.
test_cases.name: Update a todo's title

test_setup.given: TodoForm is open for editing a todo.
test_setup.then: The todo is updated in the list with the new title.
test_setup.when: User changes the title to a new valid value and submits.

test_cases.description: Checks that updating description, notes, or expiry_date alone works.
test_cases.name: Update only optional fields

test_setup.given: TodoForm is open for editing a todo.
test_setup.then: The todo is updated with new values for those fields, others remain unchanged.
test_setup.when: User modifies only optional fields and submits.

test_cases.description: Tests that updating expiry_date to an invalid format is prevented.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date

test_setup.given: TodoForm is open for editing a todo.
test_setup.then: Form shows error message and update is not sent to API.
test_setup.when: User enters expiry_date as '31-12-2023' and submits.

test_cases.description: Checks that a todo can be deleted and is removed from the UI after confirmation.
test_cases.name: Delete a todo

test_setup.given: A todo is listed in the UI.
test_setup.then: todoApi.delete is called, todo is removed from the list, and is not accessible via get or list.
test_setup.when: User clicks the delete button and confirms deletion.

test_cases.description: Ensures the UI shows an error if trying to delete a todo that no longer exists.
test_cases.name: Delete a nonexistent todo

test_setup.given: A todo was deleted elsewhere and still appears in the UI.
test_setup.then: API returns an error, UI shows error message, and removes the stale todo from list.

test_cases.description: Checks that trying to view (edit) a todo that does not exist results in an error.
test_cases.name: View a nonexistent todo

test_setup.given: A todo has been deleted but the user tries to edit it.
test_setup.then: API get-one returns error, UI displays appropriate error message.

test_cases.description: Verifies the UI displays an empty state when there are no todos.
test_cases.name: List todos when none exist

test_setup.given: The API returns an empty todo list.
test_setup.then: UI displays a message or indicator for no todos found.

test_cases.description: Checks that a title with only whitespace is rejected.
test_cases.name: Create todo with whitespace-only title

test_setup.then: Form shows required error for title, todo is not created.
test_setup.when: User enters spaces as title and submits.

test_cases.description: Ensures that expiry_date is optional and not sent if left blank.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date omitted

test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully, expiry_date is null or absent in API.
test_setup.when: User leaves expiry_date blank and submits.

test_cases.description: Checks that expiry_date can be set to blank or removed on update.
test_cases.name: Update todo to remove expiry_date

test_setup.given: A todo with expiry_date exists and is open for editing.
test_setup.then: Todo is updated, expiry_date is null or absent.
test_setup.when: User clears the expiry_date field and submits.

test_cases.description: Verifies that updating a todo that does not exist shows an error.
test_cases.name: Update a nonexistent todo

test_setup.given: A todo was deleted elsewhere and is open for editing.
test_setup.then: API returns error, UI displays error message.

test_cases.description: Checks that very long values for description/notes are accepted if within backend constraints.
test_cases.name: Create todo with maximum field lengths

test_setup.then: Todo is created if within limits; otherwise, shows error if backend rejects.
test_setup.when: User enters maximum allowed lengths for description and notes, and submits.

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with all fields filled, including valid expiry_date format.
test_cases.name: Create todo with valid title, description, notes, and expiry_date

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler
test_setup.then: onSave is called with {title: 'Buy milk', description: 'Get from store', notes: 'Check expiry', expiry_date: '2024-07-01'}; no error shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'Buy milk' for title, 'Get from store' for description, 'Check expiry' for notes, and '2024-07-01' for expiry_date, then submits form

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with only the required title field filled.
test_cases.name: Create todo with only required title

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler
test_setup.then: onSave is called with {title: 'Read book', description: null, notes: null, expiry_date: null}; no error shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'Read book' for title and leaves description, notes, expiry_date empty, then submits form

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with empty title; expects validation error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with missing title

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler
test_setup.then: Error message is shown indicating title is required; onSave is NOT called
test_setup.when: User leaves title empty and fills optional fields, then submits form

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with title containing only whitespace; expects validation error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with whitespace-only title

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler
test_setup.then: Error message is shown indicating title is required; onSave is NOT called
test_setup.when: User enters '   ' (spaces) for title and submits form

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with title and onSave handler
test_setup.then: Error message is shown indicating expiry_date format is invalid; onSave is NOT called
test_setup.when: User enters 'Walk dog' for title and '07/01/2024' for expiry_date, then submits form

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with expiry_date left empty.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty expiry_date

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with title and onSave handler
test_setup.then: onSave is called with expiry_date as null or absent; no error shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'Clean room' for title and leaves expiry_date empty, then submits form

test_cases.description: Tests updating an existing todo with only notes field modified.
test_cases.name: Update todo with only one field changed

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with existing todo values: title='Old title', description='Old desc', notes='Old notes', expiry_date='2024-07-01'
test_setup.then: onSave is called with updated notes and other fields unchanged
test_setup.when: User changes notes to 'Updated notes' and submits form

test_cases.description: Tests updating expiry_date to a non-YYYY-MM-DD value; expects validation error.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with existing todo values
test_setup.then: Error message is shown indicating invalid expiry_date format; onSave is NOT called
test_setup.when: User changes expiry_date to '2024/07/01' and submits form

test_cases.description: Tests that form fields are pre-filled with existing todo values when editing.
test_cases.name: Render form with initial values for update

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with props: title='Finish project', description='Due soon', notes='Check requirements', expiry_date='2024-07-10'
test_setup.then: Form fields are pre-filled with provided values

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with a title at the allowed max length (example: 255 chars).
test_cases.name: Submit todo with maximum allowed title length

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler
test_setup.then: onSave is called with title value of 255 characters; no error shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'T.repeat(255)' for title and submits form

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with special characters in title, description, notes, and expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Submit todo with special characters in all fields

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler
test_setup.then: onSave is called with correct values; no error shown
test_setup.when: User enters '!@#$%^&*()' for title, description, and notes, and '2024-07-01' for expiry_date, then submits form

test_cases.description: Tests user cancelling the form (if a cancel button exists).
test_cases.name: Cancel form submission

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with filled fields and cancel handler
test_setup.then: Form is closed or reset; onSave is NOT called

test_cases.description: Tests validation trigger when user leaves (blurs) the title field empty.
test_cases.name: Blur title field without input

test_setup.then: Error message appears indicating title is required
test_setup.when: User focuses and then blurs title input without entering any text

test_cases.description: Tests form submission with a title of one character.
test_cases.name: Submit todo with minimum length title

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler
test_setup.then: onSave is called with title='A'; no error shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'A' for title and submits form

test_cases.description: Ensure GET /todos returns an empty list when no todos exist in the database.
test_cases.name: List todos when database is empty

test_setup.then: Response is 200 and todos is an empty list.

test_cases.description: Ensure GET /todos returns all todos with correct fields.
test_cases.name: List todos when multiple todos exist

test_setup.given: Database contains two todos with varied fields.
test_setup.then: Response contains both todos with all fields as stored.

test_cases.description: POST /todos with valid title, description, notes, and expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all valid fields

test_setup.then: Todo is created and response contains all fields.

test_cases.description: POST /todos with only title; description, notes, expiry_date omitted.
test_cases.name: Create todo with only required field

test_setup.then: Todo is created with null optional fields.

test_cases.description: POST /todos with empty string for title should return error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty title

response_body_json.error: Title is required and cannot be empty.

test_setup.then: API returns 400 error for missing or empty title.

test_cases.description: POST /todos without title should return error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with missing title

test_setup.then: API returns 400 error for missing title.

test_cases.description: POST /todos with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' should return error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: API returns 400 error for invalid expiry_date format.

test_cases.description: POST /todos with expiry_date '2024-02-29' (valid leap year).
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date on leap day

test_setup.then: Todo is created and expiry_date is stored.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with valid leap year expiry_date.

test_cases.description: POST /todos with expiry_date '2024-13-01' (invalid month).
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date invalid month

response_body_json.error: expiry_date must be a valid date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

test_setup.then: API returns 400 error for invalid expiry_date.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with invalid month in expiry_date.

test_cases.description: GET /todos/{id} returns full todo record for an existing id.
test_cases.name: Get todo by valid id

test_setup.then: Response contains all fields for the todo.

test_cases.description: GET /todos/{id} returns error when todo does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get todo by nonexistent id

test_setup.then: API returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: PUT /todos/{id} updates only provided fields, leaves others unchanged.
test_cases.name: Update todo with some fields

test_setup.then: Only provided fields are updated.

test_cases.description: PUT /todos/{id} with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' should return error.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: API returns 400 error.

test_cases.description: PUT /todos/{id} for nonexistent id returns error.
test_cases.name: Update todo by nonexistent id

test_setup.then: API returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: DELETE /todos/{id} removes todo and it is no longer accessible.
test_cases.name: Delete todo by valid id

test_setup.then: Todo is deleted and not returned in GET /todos/2 or list.

test_cases.description: DELETE /todos/{id} for nonexistent id returns error.
test_cases.name: Delete todo by nonexistent id

test_setup.then: API returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: GET /todos returns todos with optional fields as null if not set.
test_cases.name: List todos with null optional fields

test_setup.then: Optional fields are null in response.

test_cases.description: POST /todos with title at maximum allowed length (e.g., 255 chars).
test_cases.name: Create todo with maximum title length

test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully.

test_cases.description: Retrieve an existing todo by a valid ID and expect all fields to be present.
test_cases.name: Get Todo by Valid ID

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists in the database with all fields populated.
test_setup.then: The API returns status 200 and the full todo record.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/1.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a todo that only has the required field (title), and verify optional fields are null or absent.
test_cases.name: Get Todo With Only Title

test_setup.given: A todo with id=2 exists with only the title set.
test_setup.then: The API returns status 200 with title present and other fields as null.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/2.

test_cases.description: Attempt to get a todo with an ID that does not exist, expecting a 404 error.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Nonexistent ID

test_setup.given: No todo exists in the database with id=999999.
test_setup.then: The API returns status 404 with an appropriate error message.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/999999.

test_cases.description: Attempt to access a todo using a string instead of an integer ID, expecting a 422 or 404 error.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Invalid ID Type (String)

test_setup.then: The API returns status 422 with an error about invalid ID format.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/abc.

test_cases.description: Attempt to get a todo with a negative integer ID, expecting a 404 or validation error.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Negative ID

test_setup.then: The API returns status 404.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/-1.

test_cases.description: Attempt to get a todo with ID 0, testing lower boundary for IDs.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with ID Zero

test_setup.then: The API returns status 404.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/0.

test_cases.description: Attempt to get a todo with a very large integer ID.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Large Integer ID

test_setup.then: The API returns status 404.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/9223372036854775807.

test_cases.description: Attempt to get a todo after it has been deleted, expecting a 404 error.
test_cases.name: Get Todo After Deletion

test_setup.given: A todo with id=3 existed but has been deleted.
test_setup.then: The API returns 404 as the todo no longer exists.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/3.

test_cases.description: Confirm that expiry_date is returned as null if not set on creation.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Null Expiry Date

test_setup.given: A todo with id=4 exists with expiry_date not set.
test_setup.then: The API returns status 200 with expiry_date as null.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/4.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a todo where optional fields were omitted at creation and verify their absence or null values.
test_cases.name: Get Todo With Optional Fields Absent

test_setup.given: A todo with id=5 was created with only the title.
test_setup.then: The API returns all fields, with optional fields as null.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos/5.

test_cases.description: Create a todo item by providing only the required title field, omitting all optional fields.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with only required field

test_setup.then: Todo is created with optional fields null.

test_cases.description: Create a todo item with title, description, notes, and expiry_date (valid format).
test_cases.name: Create Todo with all valid fields

test_setup.then: Todo is created with all provided fields.

test_cases.description: Try to create a todo item without providing the required title field.
test_cases.name: Create Todo missing required title

test_setup.then: Error response for missing required field.

test_cases.description: Try to create a todo item with an empty string as the title.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with empty title

test_setup.then: Error response for empty title.

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: Error response for invalid date format.

test_cases.description: Create a todo where expiry_date is explicitly set to null.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with expiry_date explicitly null

test_setup.then: Todo is created with expiry_date null.

test_cases.description: Create a todo with a title at the typical maximum length (e.g., 255 characters).
test_cases.name: Create Todo with title at maximum length

test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully.

test_cases.description: Create a todo with the title consisting of a single character.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with title of one character

test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully.

test_cases.description: Create a todo with expiry_date set to February 29 in a leap year.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with expiry_date on leap year

test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully.

test_cases.description: Retrieve the list of todos when the database is empty.
test_cases.name: List Todos when none exist

test_setup.then: Empty list is returned.

test_cases.description: Retrieve the list of todos after several have been created.
test_cases.name: List Todos after creation

test_setup.then: List contains all existing todos.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a single todo item by its id when it exists.
test_cases.name: Get Todo by valid id

test_setup.then: Returns full todo record.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a single todo item by id that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get Todo by nonexistent id

test_setup.then: Returns error for nonexistent todo.

test_cases.description: Update only the notes field of an existing todo.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with a single field

test_setup.then: Notes is updated, other fields unchanged.

test_cases.description: Update the description and expiry_date of an existing todo.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with multiple fields

test_setup.then: Fields are updated as provided.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update expiry_date to an invalid format.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: Error response for invalid date format.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update a todo that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Update Todo by nonexistent id

test_setup.then: Error response for nonexistent todo.

test_cases.description: Delete an existing todo item and ensure it is removed from list and get endpoints.
test_cases.name: Delete Todo by valid id

test_setup.then: Todo is deleted and no longer accessible.

test_cases.description: Attempt to delete a todo that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete Todo by nonexistent id

test_setup.then: Error response for nonexistent todo.

test_cases.description: Successfully updates all fields of an existing todo.
test_cases.name: Update existing todo with all fields

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists with valid initial fields.
test_setup.then: The response contains the updated todo with all specified fields changed.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made to update all fields.

test_cases.description: Successfully updates only the description of an existing todo, leaving other fields unchanged.
test_cases.name: Update existing todo with only description field

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists with title 'Existing Title', description 'Old description', notes 'Existing notes', and expiry_date '2025-01-01'.
test_setup.then: Only the description is updated; other fields remain unchanged.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with only a new description.

test_cases.description: Sends a PUT request with an empty body, expecting no changes and a successful response.
test_cases.name: Update todo with empty body (no fields)

test_setup.then: The todo is unchanged and returned as in the database.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with an empty body.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update an existing todo with an empty string for the title, expecting a validation error.
test_cases.name: Reject update with empty title

test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned indicating the title cannot be empty.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with an empty title.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update the expiry_date with an invalid format. Should return a validation error.
test_cases.name: Reject update with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned regarding the invalid expiry_date format.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with an expiry_date in the wrong format.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update expiry_date with a non-string value, expecting a validation error.
test_cases.name: Reject update with non-string expiry_date

response_body_json.error: expiry_date must be a string in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format

test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned regarding the expiry_date type.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with a non-string expiry_date.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update a todo that does not exist, expecting a 404 error.
test_cases.name: Update non-existent todo

test_setup.then: A 404 error is returned indicating the todo is not found.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made to update id=9999.

test_cases.description: Updates the title with a string at the maximum allowed length (e.g., 255 characters).
test_cases.name: Update todo with maximum length title

test_setup.then: The update is accepted; the title is set to the long string.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with a 255-character title.

test_cases.description: Attempts to set the title to a string of only whitespace, expecting a validation error.
test_cases.name: Reject update with whitespace-only title

test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned indicating the title cannot be empty.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with a whitespace-only title.

test_cases.description: Updates expiry_date to the earliest possible valid value (e.g., 0001-01-01).
test_cases.name: Update todo with earliest valid expiry_date

test_setup.then: The update is accepted, and the expiry_date is set.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with expiry_date '0001-01-01'.

test_cases.description: Updates expiry_date to a far future date (e.g., 9999-12-31) to test boundary.
test_cases.name: Update todo with far-future expiry_date

test_setup.then: The update is accepted, and the expiry_date is set.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with expiry_date '9999-12-31'.

test_cases.description: Updates a todo by explicitly setting description to null. The field should be set to null in the database.
test_cases.name: Update todo setting description to null

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists with a non-null description.
test_setup.then: The description is updated to null.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with description=null.

test_cases.description: Updates a todo by explicitly setting notes to null. The field should be set to null in the database.
test_cases.name: Update todo setting notes to null

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists with a non-null notes field.
test_setup.then: The notes field is updated to null.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with notes=null.

test_cases.description: Updates a todo by explicitly setting expiry_date to null. The field should be set to null in the database.
test_cases.name: Update todo setting expiry_date to null

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists with a non-null expiry_date.
test_setup.then: The expiry_date is updated to null.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with expiry_date=null.

test_cases.description: Sends a PUT request with malformed JSON, expecting a 400 error.
test_cases.name: Reject update with invalid JSON body

test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned indicating the request body is not valid JSON.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is made with invalid JSON.

test_cases.description: Successfully deletes a todo item with a valid ID and ensures it is no longer accessible.
test_cases.name: Delete existing todo

test_setup.given: A todo with id 101 exists in the database.
test_setup.then: Todo 101 is removed. Subsequent GET /todos/101 returns 404.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo item with an ID that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete nonexistent todo

test_setup.given: No todo with id 9999 exists in the database.
test_setup.then: API returns 404 Not Found.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo, then attempts to delete it again to ensure correct error handling.
test_cases.name: Delete todo twice

test_setup.then: First call returns 204, second call returns 404 as the item no longer exists.
test_setup.when: DELETE /todos/202 is called twice in succession.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo using an invalid ID format (non-integer).
test_cases.name: Delete todo with invalid id format

test_setup.given: No todo with id 'abc' exists; id must be integer.
test_setup.then: API returns 400 Bad Request.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with a boundary ID value (e.g., 0).
test_cases.name: Delete todo with boundary id value

test_setup.given: No todo with id 0 exists (id starts at 1).
test_setup.then: API returns 404 Not Found.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo without authentication header when authentication is required.
test_cases.name: Delete todo without authentication

test_setup.given: Authentication is required but not provided.
test_setup.then: API returns 401 Unauthorized.
test_setup.when: DELETE /todos/303 is called without authentication header.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo that has all fields (title, description, notes, expiry_date) set to verify correct removal.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with all fields set

test_setup.given: A todo with id 404 exists and all fields are populated.
test_setup.then: Todo 404 and its fields are removed. GET /todos/404 returns 404.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo when the database is empty.
test_cases.name: Delete todo in empty database

test_setup.given: Database is empty, no todos exist.
test_setup.then: API returns 404 Not Found.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo using an excessively large integer ID.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with long integer id

test_setup.then: API returns 404 Not Found.
